content: this is my first knitted sweater as simple as i could make it boat neck no ribbing 3/4 sleeves with just enough waist and sleeve shaping to add a bit of elegance top-down construction means no seaming the pattern is for women s size 34 and is an updated version of the original file it s the same free pattern but with updated formatting and a schematic now available in italian thanks to the good offices of the people at maglia-uncinetto 1 i am very pleased to be able to offer a free italian translation of this pattern available via the download link to the right it is written with metric measurements and includes an updated schematic if you re looking for additional sizes see simplest sweater sizes 2 a fee-based version of the pattern with even sizes from 32 to 48 if you re not interested in the paid version feel free to use simplest sweater as the basis for your own modifications no commercial use please or resale without prior permission enjoy 1 http //www maglia-uncinetto it/ 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/simplest-sweater-sizes
